sustainable web design

Hi! I am Jørgen, and Green Heron is my one-man web agency. I design and code websites from the ground up with the goal of having the process and product be as environmentally friendly as possible.

how I work

I use lightweight technologies and optimise code to minimise energy consumption, and hosting services that use green energy. I design and code everything myself, which results in web pages that are:

sustainabletext for that
accessibletext for that
fasttext for that
secureI ensure that the sites are secure by working with static file serving, and up-to-date SSL certificates from our hosting provider.

My commitment

Green Heron is dedicated to make web pages that are:

Environmentally sustainable
This is achieved by focusing the design and development phases on making an end product (webpage) that is as energy efficient as possible in terms of performance and code size. In addition to this, the chosen hosting provider is using green energy.

Secure
By serving webpages as static HTML, hacking is viritualy impossible as there are no entry points for facetious players. Spam protection, encryption and SSL certificates is handled by the host provider and is of industry standard.

Lightweight and fast
In conjunction with being more environmentally friendly, focusing development on reducing code size also improves page speeds and loading times.

Accessible
Working with relative font sizes and semantic HTML ensures that the resulting web pages are screen reader friendly and conform to custom font sizes for the people that need them. My design process also integrates standard UX guidelines to ensure expected behaviours for basic navigation.

Beautiful
I use my background in fine art and web development to design webpages that represent my client’s businesses or practices. I do this in creative ways that are within the constraints of my environmental commitments and take full use of the light weight technologies that are available today. The pages I make are made to be responsive on all screen widths down to at least 320 pixels, which is well below the smallest screen sizes in use today.

Testimonials

I had the pleasure of working with and mentoring Jørgen at Vibe Digital, where he freelanced as a UI designer and Mid-level Frontend developer for 10 months. Jørgen's expertise and creative flair was clear from the outset, as he crafted the initial design for a major eCommerce website that our client immediately approved. His designs were both visually appealing and highly functional, enhancing the user experience significantly.

Jørgen's iterative approach and ability to incorporate feedback ensured the project's success, especially on a site featuring 2000 products. Additionally, his innovative prototype for a mobile menu system in Figma was a standout, demonstrating his proficiency and creativity in tackling usability challenges.

Reliable, professional, and creative, Jørgen consistently met deadlines and communicated effectively with myself and our clients. His collaborative spirit made him an invaluable member of the team. I highly recommend Jørgen for any UI design or Frontend developer role.


Justin Glück
Vibe digital Media
